column3: Can you explain how the regression was introduced?

Concept ACK. Thanks.

@MarcoFalke It was my poor copy-paste, followed by some over-the-shoulder review.

Also a little related discussion in the `#bitcoin-builds` IRC channel.

edit: closing obviously accidental.
Oh, let me rephrase: Why did `REFERENCE_TIME` && `REFERENCE_DATE` work previously, but does no longer?
Ah, so the issue could be fixed by escaping properly, but you decided to use `_DATETIME` directly. Sounds fair. Maybe mention that in the OP?
> Ah, so the issue could be fixed by escaping properly, but you decided to use `_DATETIME` directly. Sounds fair. Maybe mention that in the OP?\n\nDone.

> Oh, let me rephrase: Why did `REFERENCE_TIME` && `REFERENCE_DATE` work previously, but does no longer?\n\n I don't think it was actually being used, it was in a variable and then copied and pasted into the sed by #16141 which broke the build, but should have been escaped

> I don't think it was actually being used, it was in a variable and then copied and pasted into the sed by #16141 which broke the build, but should have been escaped\n\n@sidhujag It was being used pre-16141, see: https://www.gnu.org/software/tar/manual/html_node/using-tar-options.html
